title: everytime i click on the LOL icon the League of legends symbols pop up for 2 sec but then vanishes
body: everytime there is a new LOL update i seem to have problems, this time i can't fix them myself, when i press on the League of Legends icon the League of legends symbol pops up for 2 seconds like it should and then vanishes. I have tried multiple things to fix this, reinstall, finding fixes online, deleting stuff, but none of if works. I really need help, even though im maybe not good at the game i play it constantly, and i wouldnt stop in the near future. Please help me

replies.body: The client failing to launch can happen for a few reasons, mostly security related ones.  To start off, make sure to give your PC a reboot just in case somethign crashed in the background.  You'll then want to go through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to remove whatever is blocking the client from loading properly.  Let me know if you have any questions or run into issues.
